useCase.name: User requests and views comprehensive tracking statistics

mainSequence.step: Administrator requests statistics from the UI
UI fetches statistics from Backend System
Backend System retrieves comprehensive stats from Statistics Module
Statistics Module queries faculty work data from the Database
Database returns queried data to Statistics Module
Statistics Module processes data into statistics for Backend System
Backend System generates digestible report using Report Generation Service
Report Generation Service returns generated report to Backend System
Backend System displays the report on UI
UI shows comprehensive tracking statistics to the Administrator
